Stereotype.name: UpdateToolGroup
Stereotype.notes: An update (Add/Copy/Update/Delete/Save/Cancel/Reset) tool bar implementation able to issue TableIO events to a data view.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: backgroundColor
Tag.description: Specifies the color of the containers background. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.PanelBackground in which case it does not need to be quoted;

Tag.name: border
Tag.description: The name of the border this container will display.

Tag.name: borderColor
Tag.description: In case there is a SOLID border requested the color of the solid border will be specified with this property, otherwise it will not be used by other border types. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.BorderColor in which case it does not need to be quoted

Tag.name: borderWidth
Tag.description: Only applies to SOLID border and specifies the widthof the border line.

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: firstEntryField
Tag.description: The first object name that will get applyEntry when this container gets focus, defaults to the first field in the container in the order of the create event

Tag.name: handleConfirms
Tag.description: If true, the container binds Enter to call it's ConfirmOk event and Esc to its ConfirmCancel event. (Usually overriden in child classes, not from server properties)

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnDestroy
Tag.description: Allows the container to be persisted event after a successful existObject or destroy call. The container will be simply hidden in the case of this events and not destroyed;

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true, the component will not be made visible during the initializeObject call trough the viewObject method

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: initPage
Tag.description: The page this container will be initially displaying

Tag.name: layout
Tag.description: The name of the layout manager prototype to be used as the general layout manager of the container. Valid values are: (LineLayout, TableLayout, StackLayout). If the value of this property is passed in as string (‘quoted’ value in properties) then the name of the layout manager will be looked up in the Quarix.Layout namespace, otherwise if it is used as an Java Script reference then it will be instantiated with the following parameters (container, pageName).

Tag.name: layoutCellSpacing
Tag.description: The number of pixels between the layout cells.

Tag.name: layoutSingleLine
Tag.description: If this is false/missing, IE will make the *group* multi-line instead of the containing toolbar

Tag.name: layoutTableCols
Tag.description: the number of columns the table layout will have

Tag.name: layoutTableRows
Tag.description: the number of rows the table layout will have

Tag.name: letBrowserAdjustLayout
Tag.description: Let the browser to automatically adjust the layout.

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: Maximum height of the window

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: Maximum width of the window

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: Minimum height of the window

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the container.

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onDestroyEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onHideObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be executed at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: saveType
Tag.description: Display the save or update type of tool group.

Tag.name: showAllLabels
Tag.description: Displays the text labels of each tool button from it's composition.

Tag.name: showSomeLabels
Tag.description: Displays the text labels of each tool button from it's composition that has preferLabel option set to true.

Tag.name: singlePage
Tag.description: When true, a single DOM node is created for the container which serves as both the DOMNode and the ContentDOMNode. Also, all objects are assumed to be in page 0.

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Stereotype.name: NavigationToolGroup
Stereotype.notes: An navigation tool group implementation able to generate navigation (First\Prev\Next\Last) events to a data object and also able to display the data objects query position.

Tag.name: align

Tag.name: backgroundColor

Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.PanelBackground in which case it does not need to be quoted;

Tag.name: borderColor
Tag.description: In case there is a SOLID border requested the color of the solid border will be specified with this property, otherwise it will not be used by other border types. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.BorderColor in which case it does not need to be quoted

Tag.name: borderWidth
Tag.description: Only applies to SOLID border and specifies the widthof the border line.

If the value of this property is passed in as string (‘quoted’ value in properties) then the name of the layout manager will be looked up in the Quarix.Layout namespace, otherwise if it is used as an Java Script reference then it will be instantiated with the following parameters (container, pageName).

Tag.name: layoutCellSpacing

Tag.name: layoutSingleLine

Tag.name: layoutTableCols

Stereotype.name: HtmlDataGrid

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: contentAfter
Tag.description: The HTML markup to be placed at the end of the generated content, after any of the body rows.

Tag.name: contentBefore
Tag.description: The HTML markup to be placed at the beginning of the generated content, before any of the body rows.

Tag.name: contentBody
Tag.description: For each row of data contentBody can be used to actually generate the HTML representation of the row.

Tag.name: contentSeparator
Tag.description: Between the rows the contentSeparator HTML markup will be inserted.

Tag.name: createToolbar
Tag.description: Create a basic toolbar with first/prev/next/last buttons?

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: The maximum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: The maximum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: The minimum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: noRecordContent
Tag.description: The text shown when the DataObject behind has no rows.

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish

Tag.name: pageSize
Tag.description: How many records to display at once?

Tag.name: position
Tag.description: Starting position, relative to first data batch

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Stereotype.name: FilterView
Stereotype.notes: Non GUI component able to handle the filtering process for a report or an data object.

Tag.name: applyOnInit
Tag.description: Apply the filter on initialize initalizeObject

Tag.name: enctype
Tag.description: Determines how the form data is encoded. The default value (i.e. if you don't use this attribute at all) is "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", which is sufficient for almost any kind of form data. The one exception is if you want to do file uploads. In that case you should use "multipart/form-data".

Tag.name: exitOnSuccess
Tag.description: In case of an report filter if the filter is successfully aplied the filter view will ask for confirmExit in case exitOnSuccess is set to true.

Tag.name: fields
Tag.description: List of fields contained inside the form, comma separated field names

Tag.name: method
Tag.description: In case of an report filter the HTTP method through which the parameters will be sent (possible values are : 'post', 'get')

Tag.name: msg_filterview_confirm_apply
Tag.description: Localized message for cancel apply filter message
Tag.default: 'Current values have not been applied. Apply values before exit?'

Tag.name: target
Tag.description: In case of an report filter the target browser window in which the report will be loaded.

Tag.name: trapOK
Tag.description: In case this value is true the filterview will trap the confirmOK event. Usually useful when the filter view is included in the data window and an OK event is desired to be applied on the filter and not on any data view or form view available in the window.

Tag.name: url
Tag.description: In case of an report filter the URL of the report to which the filter parameters will be sent.

Stereotype.name: DataView
Stereotype.notes: Non GUI component able to handle the whole process of add/copy/update/delete of a record from a data object.

Tag.name: afterConfirmCancelEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on event.

Tag.name: afterConfirmCancelExecute
Tag.description: Java Script to be executed on event.

Tag.name: afterConfirmCancelPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published.

Tag.name: afterDataAvailableEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on event.

Tag.name: afterDataAvailableExecute
Tag.description: Java Script to be executed on event.

Tag.name: afterDataAvailablePublish
Tag.description: Event to be published.

Tag.name: afterUpdateBeginEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on event.

Tag.name: afterUpdateBeginExecute
Tag.description: Java Script to be executed on event.

Tag.name: afterUpdateBeginPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published.

Tag.name: applyEntryOnUpdateTo
Tag.description: The id of the component which will get focus (if can focus) in case of an Update operation.

Tag.name: applyEntryTo
Tag.description: The id of the component which will get focus (if can focus) in case of an Add/Copy/Update operation.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: fields
Tag.description: List of fields contained inside the form, comma separated field names

Tag.name: fieldsDisabledOnUpdate
Tag.description: The list of fields to be disabled in case of an update operation, comma separated.

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: msg_dataview_confirm_delete
Tag.description: Localized version of record delete confirmation message.

Tag.name: msg_dataview_confirm_save
Tag.description: Localized version of update on exit confirmation message.
Tag.default: 'Current values have not been saved. Save values before exit?'

Tag.name: onDestroyEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onQueryPositionEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on event.

Tag.name: onQueryPositionExecute
Tag.description: Java Script to be executed on event.

Tag.name: onQueryPositionPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published.

Tag.name: onUpdateBeginEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on event.

Tag.name: onUpdateBeginExecute
Tag.description: Java Script to be executed on event.

Tag.name: onUpdateBeginPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published.

Tag.name: onUpdateCompleteEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on event.

Tag.name: onUpdateCompleteExecute
Tag.description: Java Script to be executed on event.

Tag.name: onUpdateCompletePublish

Tag.name: onUpdateEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on event.

Tag.name: onUpdateExecute
Tag.description: Java Script to be executed on event.

Tag.name: onUpdatePublish
Tag.description: Event to be published.

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: startAction
Tag.description: Action to be made on initialize object.

Stereotype.name: DataGrid
Stereotype.notes: The DataGrid control provides a simple yet powerful API to display tabular data on a web page. Notable features include sortable columns, pagination, scrolling, row selection and resizeable columns. A browse component is also able to display the data from a DataObject and insure navigation through the records of the DataObject.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: editable
Tag.description: Enable edit mode in this browse.

Tag.name: fieldsDisabledOnUpdate
Tag.description: A list of fields in the editable browse that will be left disabled on update.

Tag.name: generatePopup
Tag.description: If true and the Browse doesn't have a Quarix.Widgets.PopupMenu assigned but it has a tool bar, a pop up menu is automatically generated from the tool bar

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: The maximum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: The maximum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: The minimum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: msg_dataview_confirm_delete
Tag.description: The delete confirmation text displayed to the user.

Tag.name: msg_dataview_confirm_save
Tag.description: The save confirmation text displayed to the user.
Tag.default: 'Current values have not been saved. Save values before exit?'

Tag.name: msg_smartbrowse_empty
Tag.description: The text shown when the DataObject behind has no rows.
Tag.default: 'There are no rows to display. Either the table is empty or the filters didn't let anything through.'

Tag.name: multiselect
Tag.description: Can more than one row be selected at a time

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onApplyEntryEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on applyEntry event (focus).

Tag.name: onApplyEntryExecute
Tag.description: Java Script code to be executed on applyEntry event (focus).

Tag.name: onApplyEntryPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published on applyEntry event (focus).

Tag.name: onDblClickEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on mouse double click event.

Tag.name: onDblClickExecute

Tag.name: onDblClickPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published on mouse double click event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute

Tag.name: onEnableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnterEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on keyboard enter event on browse row.

Tag.name: onEnterExecute

Tag.name: onEnterPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published on keyboard enter event on browse row.

Tag.name: onHideObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be executed at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish

Tag.name: parseButtonGroupsToPopup
Tag.description: When generating pop up, also extract tool buttons from tool groups

Tag.name: rows
Tag.description: How many rows to display at a time (note that less are displayed if there is a horizontal scroll bar.

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)
